name: Escape Plan (itch)
description:
All assets from kenney.nl

HOW TO PLAY 

- MOVE CHARACTER WITH RMB

-ROTATE BUILDINGS WITH R

-MOVE CAMERA WITH WASD

-ZOOM/OUT CAMERA WITH MMB

TIPS 

-Use Miner Craft for mining big resources and deliver them to big garage

-Use rovers to collect big resources autonome

-Explore planet for unique item

Year 2845,
The wars, earthquakes and lack of water in the world have made the world uninhabitable.

Because of Professor Philip, as a result of his work, sets out to go to the planet 911B. The journey will take approximately 13 Years.

While on the road, Professor Philip  has to make an emergency landing to Mars because of the engine failure.

Has only one thing to do
Gather Resources, Repair the Space Shuttle And Go To Planet 911B...
